Name: Rohit Sharma
detail: Sharma currently holds the world record for the highest individual score (264) in a one-day international.

Name: Virat Kohli
detail: He reached the number one spot in the ICC rankings for ODI batsmen for the first time in 2013

Name: KL Rahul
detail: He was the first Indian to score a century on men's One Day International debut

Name: Shubman Gill
detail: He was drafted into India's Under-19 side as the vice-captain for the 2018 Under-19 Cricket World Cup

Name: Shikhar Dhawan
detail: he became the first Indian and ninth overall to score a century in his 100th ODI game

Name: Mayank Agarwal
detail: He made his international debut for the India cricket team on 26 December 2018 against Australia at the MCG

Name: Shreyas Iyer
detail: A right-handed middle-order batsman, Iyer has played One Day Internationals, Twenty20 Internationals and Test cricket for the India national cricket team

Name: Ajinkya Rahane
detail: Under his captaincy, India won the 2020-21 Borderâ€“Gavaskar Trophy in Australia.

Name: Hanuma Vihari
detail: he was a member of the India Under-19 cricket team that won the 2012 ICC Under-19 Cricket World Cup in Australia

Name: Ravichandran Ashwin
detail: he is currently the highest-ranked spinner in Test cricket, and the highest-ranked Test bowler for India on the ICC Player Rankings

Name: Deepak Chahar
detail: He became the first Indian male cricketer to take a hat-trick in a Twenty20 International (T20I) match.

Name: Ravindra Jadeja
detail: he became the top ranked bowler in the world leaving behind Ravichandran Ashwin who held that position for a long time

Name: Shardul Thakur
detail: He is a medium-fast bowler and a capable lower-order right-handed batsman. He plays first-class cricket for Mumbai
